tls:text.tls:line: The only thing without study in which you may have ability [Note 85 by Marnix Wells 2017: See Mencius 7A15.

sense.def: the systematic attempt to learn about things (typically from a teacher) study; the pursuit of intellectual/moral self-development; learning

tls:text.tls:line: The only thing without study in which you may have ability [Note 85 by Marnix Wells 2017: See Mencius 7A15.

sense.def: be capable and competent; be able to act, be in a position to act
sleep (peacefully)
act of eating, meal; time of a meal
sleeping; resting in sleep
student
of superior or highest quality; of the superior kind; superior; of higher status

tls:text.tls:line: The Sage in studyhing problems, submits to his teacher

sense.def: engage in study; engage in scholarship

sense.def: teacher of oneself
how? i.e. in no way!
necessity ordained by Heaven; Heaven-determined inescapable necessity
the Nine Heavens
quite generally; as a matter of principle, speaking in general of (the topic);
Threefold Minister; a senior minister
=大一 Grand Primordial Unison
fail to/refuse to V the explicit preposed pronominalised object; would not V the explicit preposed pronominalised object
